SERVICE.name: Tender
SERVICE.COMMENT: This service implements the Tender Use Case of the Tender Package.

ROAD.name: CreditSelected
ROAD.COMMENT: OfflineCredit is used for Old Functionality of Credit Tendering using Manual EDC, Online is for new implementation using EDC

STATION.name: ChargeSlipPrintingStation
STATION.COMMENT: This station is the transfer point for the Printing service.

ROAD.name: PrintingReturned
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traveled when the Printing service returns and there are no items that require activation.
